summary: This is an email from an FBI agent in New York to another FBI agent, forwarding GPS warrants related to the Epstein case. The sender notes a 'true bill today' (likely referring to a grand jury indictment) and indicates the warrants will be served, asking the recipient to get them to their contacts.

events.title: GPS Warrants Forwarded
events.description: An FBI agent emails GPS warrants to another FBI agent, mentioning a 'true bill today' and that someone will serve the warrants.

keyFacts: GPS warrants were issued in the Epstein investigation as of June 29, 2020.
The email references a 'true bill today,' indicating a grand jury likely returned an indictment that day.
The correspondence shows coordination between FBI agents in New York regarding serving warrants.
The attachments (Warrant_1.pdf, Warrant_2.pdf) are not included in the provided text.
